author: kwright
msg: Factor out modifications to connectors.xml into separate callable targets.  Part of CONNECTORS-384.

author: jdcasey
msg: [SUREFIRE-806] Detect when multiple test executions are configured, and if only a single execution is present, use specified tests for includes (if they're available), which is the old behavior. If multiple test executions are specified, then use the specified tests as a filter for the existing includes/excludes, to make sure each specified test executes in the appropriate configuration.
Also, adding three integration tests to verify these include/exclude conditions, plus the functioning of the new failIfNoSpecifiedTests parameter.

author: danielsh
msg: On the ev2-export branch: don't expand newlines for special files, either.
